about_the_game:
"Minesweeper & Dungeon RPG" is an RPG game that combines minesweeping and rogue-like gameplay. Players explore the game world using classic minesweeper mechanics, collecting coins and treasure chests. By building up their skills, equipment, and items, players enhance their power to face the challenges of different world regions and unique enemies, ultimately completing the final adventure.

Minesweeping + Rogue-like: Combining Logic and Challenge
Players need classic minesweeping reasoning skills and extreme in-game builds. The gameplay is simple, but completing it is not.

In-game Leveling and Out-of-game Talent Development
Standard features of rogue-like games are present. After leveling up in the game, players choose one of three skills. Regardless of winning or losing, players can carry runes out of the game for out-of-game talent development.

Six Chapters: A Vast World of Minesweeping
Forest, swamp, desert, snowy mountain, volcano, and demon castle. Each region has its own characteristics, constantly bringing new challenges and maximum tension.

Six Characters: Unlock Different Experiences
Apprentice Knight, Robed Mage, Elf Hunter, Viking Warrior, Devout Priest, and Lolita Witch, each character has unique strengths to help players complete the game.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Sierra 10.12+
  • Processor: Intel Core i3, 2.4 Ghz or higher / Apple M1 or higher
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 mb video memory or higher
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Sierra 10.12+
  • Processor: Intel Core i3, 2.4 Ghz or higher / Apple M1 or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 mb video memory or higher
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

name: Minesweeper & Dungeon RPG - 扫雷与地下城

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1 Gigahertz(GHz) or faster
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 mb video memory or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11 64-bit
  • Processor: 1 Gigahertz(GHz) or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 mb video memory or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

short_description: A unique RPG that combines minesweeping and rogue-like gameplay. Players explore the game world using classic minesweeper mechanics, collecting coins and treasure chests. By building up their skills, equipment, and items, they enhance their power. Can you complete the game?
